name: ghostboi34
body: Thanks to this I have been able to connect with and form a relationship with the ghost of Randy Newmen.

name: Robert Smith
body: I can't believe it's good to bring a ghost home. For this reason, ghosts were created from the moment I wanted to be again. Thank you very much for the advice.

name: Jannet "spooky" Barbitsky
body: This is some spooky stuff, be careful

name: Phil
body: This is good, but I could not find big food with it

name: John Cena*
body: This device litrally finds ghosts, don't let any one tell you diffrent. *Leagally we must point out that this reviewer has no realtions to the global sensation wrestler named John Cena
